text: Hi All, I have a question of the devs, if they would give me their honest answer. Do you guys think it is a good idea to move the plots of the documentation of one our packages (specifically Agents.jl) to CairoMakie, and use that one for our Recipies and plotting functions, instead of Plots.jl?

text: I think nobody can answer that for you :) I've been using Makie for my work for months but of course I have better means than others to work around the kinks. But especially the layouting stuff and simple font management are very useful for me all the time and I wouldn't want to switch anymore.

text:
My question targets more stability, and how often I would have to "fix my docs because the plots are not showing", than available functionality. The available functionality already satisfies me, there is no issue there. (and I also don't need latex for the specific use case)

That's why I am asking for the developers honest opinion, because only they can give statements "yes I'm comfortable with current state and forsee stability" or "no, don't do this yet".
